modName: Em's Mature Imperial Presets for RaceMenu
summary: This mod offers ten female Imperial presets that are loosely based off of the given presets.
descriptionHtml:
[center]Hello, again! I bring you 10 female Imperial presets that are loosely based off of the original Skyrim Presets. I was growing tired of seeing all the anime waifu mods and wanted to create something that was a little more realistic but still stuck to the lore. All women are named based off of the color of their warpaints. All will use Mature Skin and KS Hairdos. All the required mods will be under the pictures of each woman. I hope you enjoy them and send me pictures of them in game!

[size=4]General Requirements:[/size]
[color=#999999][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624][color=#999999]RaceMenu[/color][/url]﻿ [/color]by Expired
[url=http://skse.silverlock.org/][color=#999999]SKSE[/color][/url][color=#999999]﻿
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51038/?][color=#999999]SKSE ini pre-download for Lazy Users[/color][/url]﻿ [/color]by Sagittarius22 if you want the tints to be high-res.
[b]Not required, [/b]but I am using [color=#999999][size=2][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30936/?tab=files][color=#999999]RealVision ENB[/color][/url]﻿ [/size][/color]by SkyrimTuner for those who want the women to look exactly the same as the screenshots.[/center][center]
Also, here is a very informing video on [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HdPQiOiWfSA][color=#999999]How To Sculpt Heads in Racemenu[/color][/url]﻿ by[color=#999999] [/color][size=2][url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCz4XJXFO-NB7NcGU0c0453Q][color=#999999]Gearhog[/color][/url][color=#666666]﻿[/color] [/size]for those who do not know how to do so.[/center][center]﻿[/center]
[url=https://flic.kr/p/277RT1U][img]https://farm1.staticflickr.com/943/42084464232_8cb979353e_h.jpg[/img][/url]﻿

[center][color=#cc4125][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=5][b]Amber[/b][/size][/font][/color][size=4]
